motd:
Welcome to LunaSea v10.2.4!

This update adds direct links to the documentation to correctly set up service notifications, as well as fixes underlying issues with network image caching and text rendering due to the fading edge on horizontally scrollable text.

settings.message: add direct link to documentation for service notifications
replace all strings with localizable strings

images.message: more efficiently cache persistent network images

uiux.message: remove fading edge on horizontal scroll-views
